Post.title: js-design-pattern
hexo
Post._content:
###  
``` bash
> hexo new [layout] <title>
> layoutpost
```

###  

``` bash
> hexo publish [layout] <name>
```
###  

``` bash
> hexo clean
```
###  

``` bash
> hexo generate
```

###  
``` bash
> hexo server
```

###  
``` bash
> hexo deploy
```

###  
``` bash
> hexo list route
```
